intension: Create a Facebook ad for a baby store that promotes the sale of baby cribs and furniture for nursery rooms. The store name is Dunclow and the website address is dunclow.dk.
globalcaption: The image features a cozy nursery with a crib and a chair. The crib is positioned on the left side of the room, while the chair is located on the right side. The room is decorated with a few stuffed animals, including a teddy bear placed on the right side of the crib and another teddy bear sitting on the chair.\n\nThere are also two pillows in the room, one on the crib and another on the chair. A baby can be seen in the crib, possibly sleeping or resting. The overall atmosphere of the room is warm and inviting, creating a comfortable space for a baby to sleep and
keywords: baby, crib, furniture, home, interior, lounge, modern, nursery, room, facebook, ad, fb, advertisement, sale

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a pink background with a white square in the center. The white square has a blue cross on it, which is a symbol often associated with medical care or healthcare. The combination of the pink background and the blue cross creates a visually appealing contrast

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a nursery room with a crib and a chair. The crib is positioned on the left side of the room, while the chair is located on the right side. The room is decorated with a pink and blue color scheme, giving it a cozy and inviting atmosphere.\n\nThere are several stuffed animals in the room, including a teddy bear placed on the right side of the crib and another teddy bear sitting on the chair. A third teddy bear is also present in the room, placed on the floor near the crib. The room appears to be well-organized and ready for a baby's arrival
